amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Transportation Security Administration Aviation Security account by $61 million and to increase the Federal Air Marshals account by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Transportation Security Administration Aviation Security account by $61 million and increase the Federal Air Marshals account by $50 million.

action.text: Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 355 (Roll no. 355).
